description: head of a man at center, mouth open; below left and right, devil's heads; upper right dragon; upper left devil with trident pushing figure; firey background
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription
in black in plate: ANIMA IN INFERNO | below image in black: Quid nobis proferit superbia? quid dinitarii/ iactantia? in malignitate autem consumpti suimus/ c. de Mallery fe et s   Sap 5(?) | In pencil on sheet: 2-9
title: Anima In Inferno
